reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Support to CBOs and Youth organisations in Kayah State, myanmar

description.narrative: The space for civil society in Myanmar has been limited for decades and as a result civil society actors have low capacities. Active civil society is a prerequisite for democratic and sustainable development. Therefore taking into account the interests of different groups and the strengthening of their capacities is particularly important in post-conflict situations, in order to achieve sustainable peace. The project aims to contribute to inclusive peace building and development in South East Myanmar throug h enhancement of the civil society organisations representing ethnic minority groups, especially youth and women organizations. The specific objective is that the targeted CBOs are able to accomplish their missions and actively contribute to development in diverse sectors such as promotion of women empowerment, human rights, multi-culture and vocational education. The project will support three CBOs in the planning and implementation of pilot projects in Kayah State
